text: Aniatachu, manêkin nang ku lungkhamna sikin, keima Paul nikhom ronga, hima hih thôn Khrista Jisua palâi, male atûn hin khom ama jâra mi intângpu nikhom ronga ngêna ko dôn ani.1:9: Khrista Jisua palâi, le atûn hin khom ama jâra intâng ina om; aninônchu miriem tar, le Khrista Jisua jâra atûn hin intâng ina ompu.
